title: Never Watched One Piece - Episode 114 Review
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: Detailed first-time watcher review and analysis of Episode 114, praising Chopper's versatility as a fighter and expressing sympathy for Usopp's limited role while hoping he proves himself.
highlights: Describes Chopper as 'the most versatile fighter in the crew'
Notes Usopp 'mostly ran away this episode'
Appreciates the extended fight sequences despite initial skepticism
Predicts Usopp will hammer Miss Merry Christmas 'into the ground like a tent peg'

title: One Journey (A One Piece Podcast) - Episodes 114-116

description: Podcast episode covering the conclusion of Usopp and Chopper's battle against Mr. 4 and Miss Merry Christmas, discussing the teamwork and character development shown during these episodes.
highlights: Discusses the synergy between Usopp and Chopper
Analyzes the whack-a-mole battle tactics
Commentary on Usopp's character growth
